features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Discover all the tools and capabilities that make urlz.lat the perfect choice for your link management needs.

smart_shortening.title: Smart URL Shortening
smart_shortening.description: Create short, memorable links instantly with our advanced algorithm that generates unique codes.

real_time_analytics.title: Real-Time Analytics
real_time_analytics.description: Track clicks, analyze audience behavior, and get detailed insights with interactive charts and maps.

custom_branded_links.title: Custom Branded Links
custom_branded_links.description: Create custom slugs that reflect your brand and make your links more memorable and trustworthy.

url_safety.title: URL Safety Verification
url_safety.description: Automatic URL safety checking using Google Safe Browsing API to protect users from malicious links.

qr_generation.title: QR Code Generation
qr_generation.description: Automatically generate QR codes for all your links with download and sharing capabilities.

link_preview.title: Link Preview
link_preview.description: Safe preview of destination URLs before clicking, showing page title, description, and favicon.

mobile_optimized.title: Mobile Optimized
mobile_optimized.description: Fully responsive design that works perfectly on all devices, from desktop to mobile.

link_management.title: Link Management
link_management.description: Organize, edit, and manage all your links from a centralized dashboard with search and pagination.

features.ready_subtitle: Join thousands of users who trust urlz.lat for their link management needs. Start shortening and tracking your URLs today.

about.title: About urlz.lat
about.subtitle: We're on a mission to make link sharing smarter, faster, and more insightful for everyone.
about.mission_text: At urlz.lat, we believe that every link tells a story. Our platform empowers individuals and businesses to create meaningful connections through smart URL shortening, comprehensive analytics, and branded link management. We're committed to providing tools that not only shorten your links but also amplify your digital presence.
about.founder_bio_1: With over a decade of experience in software development and digital innovation, Milton brings a unique perspective to URL management and analytics. His passion for creating tools that simplify complex processes led to the creation of urlz.lat.
about.founder_bio_2: Milton's background spans full-stack development, product management, and entrepreneurship. He believes in building technology that empowers users while maintaining the highest standards of privacy and security.
about.founder_quote: Every link tells a story, and our mission is to help you tell yours better. We're not just shortening URLs – we're creating connections that matter.
about.user_centric_desc: Every feature we build is designed with our users in mind, ensuring simplicity without sacrificing power.
about.excellence_desc: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from our code quality to our customer support.
about.community_desc: We're building more than a tool – we're fostering a community of creators, marketers, and innovators.
about.story_text_1: Founded in 2024, urlz.lat emerged from a simple observation: link sharing was becoming increasingly important in our digital world, but existing solutions were either too complex or too limited.
about.story_text_2: We set out to create a platform that combines the simplicity of traditional URL shorteners with the power of modern analytics and branding tools. Today, we're proud to serve thousands of users who trust us with their most important links.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions, feedback, or need support? We'd love to hear from you. Reach out and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.response_time_desc: We typically respond within 24 hours during business days.
contact.custom_slug_help: How do I create a custom slug?
contact.custom_slug_answer: Custom slugs are available with our Pro plan. Simply enter your desired slug when creating a link.
contact.analytics_help: Can I track my link analytics?
contact.analytics_answer: Yes! All users get access to basic analytics. Pro users get advanced analytics with detailed insights.
contact.api_answer: API access is available for Business plan subscribers. Contact us for documentation.
contact.message_sent_desc: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.message_placeholder: Tell us how we can help you...

home.why_sign_up_subtitle: Unlock powerful features and insights with a free urlz.lat account
home.track_everything_desc: Get detailed analytics on every click. See where your audience comes from, what devices they use, and when they're most active.
home.brand_your_links_desc: Create custom, memorable links that reflect your brand. Build trust and recognition with every share.
home.manage_with_ease_desc: Organize all your links in one dashboard. Edit, delete, and monitor performance from anywhere.
home.go_pro_title: Take Your Links to the Next Level with Pro
home.custom_domains_desc: Use your own domain for maximum brand recognition
home.qr_with_logo_desc: Generate branded QR codes with your company logo
home.advanced_analytics_desc: Deep insights with conversion tracking and A/B testing
